main_address_raw_text: maison papier français / 22 place du général catroux / 75017 paris / france
short_description: eazywallz is a commercial printing company based in paris, france.
long_description: we believe that every wall has a story to tell, and giving your walls a voice is our purest passion. your living, working and sleeping spaces are where life happens. we converse, brainstorm, and dream between four walls… but what if your walls could join the conversation. what if your walls could propel more compelling conversations, brighter ideas and deeper dreams? eazywallz facilitates enhanced experiences through storytelling and design. with one of the most advanced printing platform in europe, we have proudly provided our clients with the best made-to-measure products and services for more than a decade. with eazywallz.eu, your walls will be talking in just a few clicks. supporting professionals striving to bring their own visions to life is a great source of pride for our team. for you, we created the eazywallz trade program for leveraging our partnership. we are privileged to work with a prestigious network of artists, designers, photographs, galeries, labels or brands to create wallpaper murals every day of the year.
business_tags: wall mural | kids wallpaper | removable wallpaper | architectural walls | geometric wallpaper | custom wall murals | landscape walls | floral walls | wallpaper murals | birds of paradise | wall coverings | happy flowers | street art | premium prints | manufacturing strategy | texturing and finishing | on demand printing | care pack | corporate offices | interior design | wellness centers | artist community | hotel restaurants | art & technology | data & protection | business & trade | animals & wildlife | residential and commercial
generated_description: eazywallz is a company based in paris, ile-de-france, specializing in made-to-measure creative wallpapers. established over a decade ago, the company offers a wide range of wall murals and wallpapers, including jungle and tropical, kids, abstract and geometric, floral, forest, nature and landscapes, texture, urban and street art, architectural, vintage, and animals and wildlife themes. eazywallz provides 100% secure payment options and offers free and fast delivery within 2 to 4 business days. the company caters to both individual customers and professionals, including architects and designers, with a focus on creating unique and visually appealing wall coverings.
